DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect omega-3 fatty acid supplementation pediatric patient undergoing hemodialysis via measurement follow omega-3 administration : oxidative stress marker , inflammatory marker serum lipid .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Omega-3 Fatty Acids Oxidative Stress Dyslipidemia Pediatric Patients Undergoing Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Patients 8 18 year old Patients treat HD least 6 month Patients malignancy active inflammatory disease . Patients receive vitamin E antioxidant treatment past 3 month .
